rows.label: qst710501_msg0001
rows.name:
I'm compiling an encyclopedia of
unique monsters from various regions.

rows.label: qst710501_msg0002
rows.name:
I've been to Shiya, Superbia,
Liberalitas, Invidia, and
Estham, and now I'm here.

rows.label: qst710501_msg0003
rows.name:
The main remaining Divine Beasts
are Iira and Gula, but...

rows.label: qst710501_msg0004
rows.name:
There aren't many skilled fighters
who can take on unique monsters,
so it's hard to get information.

rows.label: qst710501_msg0005
rows.name:
But I'm prepared to spend
decades compiling it.

rows.label: qst710501_msg0006
rows.name:
The question is whether the
encyclopedia will be finished
first, or if I'll die first...

rows.label: qst710501_msg0007
rows.name:
If you can, I'd like
you all to help me.

rows.label: qst710501_msg0008
rows.name:
As far as my research goes, there are
still 16 types of unique monsters that
haven't been included in the encyclopedia.

rows.label: qst710501_msg0009
rows.name:
If you see a monster with a
unique name in any region,
that's a unique monster.

rows.label: qst710501_msg0010
rows.name:
Unique monsters are quite tough, but
I'm counting on your strength to help
me achieve my lifelong dream.

rows.label: qst710501_msg0011
rows.name:
Now, first, please check the
status of the unique monsters
you've defeated so far.

rows.label: qst710501_msg0101
rows.name:
You all... when you defeat a unique
monster, please let me know.

rows.label: qst710501_msg0102
rows.name:
Now, these are the unique monsters
I've heard about so far.

rows.label: qst710501_msg0103
rows.name:
There must still be many unique
monsters in Iira and Gula that
neither I nor you know about.
